meanings.sent1: The ship proudly displayed its ensigns as it sailed into the harbor.
meanings.sent2: During the parade, colorful ensigns fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The ensigns at the beach party added a festive touch to the event.
meanings.sent4: The ensigns of unity and peace were raised high during the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The ensigns of different countries lined the street, creating a vibrant display.

meanings.sent1: The royal family's crest served as their ensigns of honor.
meanings.sent2: The knight proudly wore his ensigns on his armor.
meanings.sent3: The ensigns on the superhero's cape glowed brightly in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The ensigns of the secret society were shrouded in mystery.
meanings.sent5: The ensigns of bravery and courage were awarded to the deserving soldier.

meanings.sent1: He was promoted to the rank of ensigns after years of service.
meanings.sent2: The ensigns led the troops into battle with determination.
meanings.sent3: The ensigns were in charge of organizing the military parade.
meanings.sent4: The ensigns saluted their superior officers with respect.
meanings.sent5: The ensigns were known for their bravery and loyalty on the battlefield.
